name: Escape from Habik
description:
Game about running away from nicobot like thing with a speedruning niche. 

Keep in mind that this game is work in progress (at this moment daily updates) and most of the bugs which are seen in the game now will be hopefully gone until the version 1.0.0 (with a lot of new bugs xDD) 

The maps are difficult, the game is difficult, but don't forget that the game is movement focused & you should be able to run away from the HABIK at any moment! (left or right strafe +  left or right arrow gives speed boost also a + w or d + w gives more speed as well)

(description made at ver 0.0.4)
